sect1.title: How to run
sect1.para: At first you need to clone this repository in a ros workspace. Build the package in a ros1 sourced terminal running catkin_make

For running the simulation the user needs to open two terminals, both sourced with ROS. In the first one the simulation will be run, as well as all the nodes but this one. Run: roslaunchrt2_assignment2sim.launch
In the second terminal, move in the folder ros_ws/src/rt2_assignment2/notebook
Once the jupyter is opened go in the file user_interface.ipynb and run every node. At this point everything is running and the user is able to decide how to interact with the robot.
